name: huggybear
description: On demand, persistent and unobstrusive dependencies

scripts.cover-test: `npm bin`/coffee --js < spec/runner.coffee > spec/__compiled_runner.js && `npm bin`/istanbul cover -x "spec/**" spec/__compiled_runner.js 2> /dev/null && rm -f spec/__compiled_runner.js

author: Xavier Cambar <xcambar@gmail.com>
